personal.name: Your Name
personal.title: Service Planner & Tech Innovator
personal.catchphrase: Solving problems with data, creating value through experience.
personal.bio: From managing a thriving café to building e-commerce platforms, my journey has been about bridging the gap between people and technology. I believe that great service planning comes from understanding both the human experience and the technical possibilities. Every challenge I've faced has taught me to think strategically, act decisively, and create solutions that truly matter.

responsibilities: Led product strategy and roadmap planning for AI-powered solutions
Coordinated cross-functional teams to deliver features on schedule
Conducted user research and translated insights into actionable requirements
Managed end-to-end operations for online store generating $10K monthly
Increased customer retention by 20% through personalized service
Managed daily operations, staff, and finances
Built community through events and social media presence

projects.title: AI Price Comparison Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive platform that helps users find the best prices across multiple online retailers using AI-powered matching.
projects.longDescription: Developed during a hackathon, this platform leverages machine learning to identify identical products across different e-commerce sites, even when they have different names or descriptions. The system processes thousands of product listings daily and provides users with real-time price comparisons.
projects.myRole: Led the service planning and concept design. Designed the user flow and coordinated with the development team to implement the AI matching algorithm.
projects.results: Won 1st place in the hackathon competition. Received positive feedback from judges for innovative use of AI and excellent user experience.

projects.title: Community Dashboard
projects.description: A real-time dashboard for community managers to track engagement metrics and user activity.
projects.longDescription: Built to solve the pain point of fragmented community data, this dashboard aggregates information from multiple sources and presents it in an intuitive, actionable format. Features include real-time notifications, custom report generation, and predictive analytics.
projects.myRole: Planned the entire service architecture and feature set. Conducted user interviews with community managers to identify key metrics and designed the dashboard layout.
projects.results: Reduced time spent on reporting by 60% for pilot users. Successfully deployed for 3 communities with 5000+ total members.

awards.title: 1st Place - AI Hackathon 2023
